title: 4.2 Master Challenge 2
question:
A software developer wants to write a pseudocode that sorts a list of integers in ascending order. Develop a procedure that takes in a list of integers and sorts them in ascending order.
Consider the following pseudocode that calculates and displays the Body Mass Index (BMI):

Modify this pseudocode using procedural abstraction to make it more organized and maintainable. Split the code into appropriate procedures and demonstrate how to call these procedures. Write a JavaScript program for the same.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
